thedavid,"2010-12-18T14:12:18.153Z","I like it!","

This is a set whitch is simplistic, but fun. The minifigure in this set is just perfect! The orange color is good for this set, and the part on the backside is nice too. It's a nice set! for kids this set is hard to break, because the pieces are big. it's not hard to build either. I saw these in shops and they whore cheap and fun,

Cool. Nice to play and value for money

column7: Indeed this set is a good reason for Brickset to introduce a zero rating.&nbsp

column1: This set represents the nadir of juniorisation and it was sets like these that almost sent Lego broke in the early 2000s.
column2: Every designer employed by Lego should have a picture of this set as their desktop art on their computers, as a constant reminder what <u>not</u> to do.&nbsp

column1: Just about every other tow truck ever released by Lego has better play value than this monstrosity.
column2: If you have some small person in your life who you really dislike, find this online and buy it for them.&nbsp
column3: Who knows, the seller may even pay you to take it.&nbsp

column1: When I saw this set had only one review and it was a 4, I simply had to set the record straight.
column2: Other lovers of Lego should do the same to take the average&nbsp
